tool_description: Identifies customers eligible for review requests based on their recent purchase history and filters them according to specified criteria.

days_since_purchase.description: Number of days since purchase to consider for review requests (1-365)

min_order_value.description: Minimum order value to qualify for review request

exclude_returned_items.description: Whether to exclude customers who returned items

error_messages: Invalid days range: days_since_purchase must be between 1 and 365.
Invalid order value: min_order_value must be a positive number or zero.
Empty product categories: If provided, product_categories array cannot be empty.
Database connection failed: Unable to retrieve purchase data from the database.
usage: Specify the time window and filtering criteria to identify customers eligible for review requests. The tool returns a list of qualified customers with their purchase details.

eligible_customers_count.description: Total number of eligible customers found

customer_ids.description: List of customer IDs eligible for review requests

purchase_dates.description: Purchase dates for each customer in date-time format

order_values.description: Order values corresponding to each customer
